## WriteOptions interface

Options used by [InfluxDBClient.write()](./influxdb3-client.influxdbclient.write.md) .

**Signature:**

```typescript
interface WriteOptions 
```

## Example

WriteOptions in write call

```typescript
      client
        .write(point, DATABASE, 'cpu', {
          headers: {
            'channel-lane': 'reserved',
            'notify-central': '30m',
          },
          precision: 'ns',
          gzipThreshold: 1000,
        })
```
